settings.title: Redefine Group Meetings with Our 6 Person Office Pod
settings.subheading: Are you in search of a meeting space that fosters teamwork, creativity, and productivity on a larger scale? Look no further. Our Quell 6-person office pod is designed to provide a spacious and acoustically superior environment for your team meetings, brain storming sessions, and collaborative projects.

settings.content:

environment.

settings.title: Elevate Collaboration with Our 6 Person Meeting Pod

settings.text:
Soundbox Store is your premier supplier of cutting-edge
sound solutions and innovative acoustic meeting booths. We are dedicated to reshaping the
way you conduct meetings and collaborate within your workspace.

Our intelligently designed 6-person pods provide a
soundproof and private space for confidential meetings, brainstorming sessions,
and creative endeavors. With exceptional acoustic dampening, integrated
ventilation, and customisable options, our 6-person desk pod embodies modern
office design, ensuring an inspiring atmosphere in your workplace.

What Sets Our 6 Person Desk Pod
Apart?

At Sound Box Store, we understand the
importance of creating a peaceful, distraction-free workspace. Our acoustic 6 person
acoustic meeting booths provide an ideal solution for businesses aiming to
optimise their office environment, group conference calls, and meetings.

Quality and service are at the core of
everything we offer at Soundbox Store. Our factory meticulously selects the
best recyclable materials, ensuring they meet the highest performance and
durability standards. Our knowledgeable team is always available to
assist you in finding the perfect product that aligns with your specific
requirements.

Why Opt for Our 6 Person Desk Pod
Power and Connectivity
Equipped with power pints, USB and USB-C ports to support your device.

Design & Freedom
Tailor the interior to match your offices style and functionality.

Enhance Productivity
Foster teamwork and collaboration on a larger scale with this spacious pod.

settings.title: What are the dimensions of the Quell 6 Person Office Pod?
settings.text: The Quell 6 Person Office Pod is designed to provide ample space for collaborative meetings. Its interior dimensions measure: Height: 214cm, Width: 204cm, and Depth: 210cm. This ensures that your team has plenty of room to work comfortably.

settings.title: Can I customise the interior ofthe 6 Person Desk Pod to match our office's style and functionality?
settings.text:
Yes, you can! At Soundbox Store, we offer customisation
options that allow you to tailor the interior of your 6 Person Desk Pod to
match your office's unique style and functionality requirements. Whether you
prefer a traditional conference room setup or a more creative and open
workspace, we can accommodate your needs.

settings.title: How long does assembly take?
settings.text: Soundbox Stores large 6 person meting / conference booth, come in a number of parts that are logical to assembly. We do however suggest using our qualified and insured installers. The installer will take up to 3 hours to install the 6 Person acoustic pod once fully unpacked.

settings.title: Is special electric power supply required.
settings.text:
All of our booths are plug and play, meaning once built there is an insert for a 13amp cable on the side of the booth which approximately 2 metres long. This is the simply plugged into your normal power socket.

(UK, Euro, US supplied dependent on delivery address)

settings.title: How does the acoustic performance of the 6 Person Meeting Pod compare to smaller pods?
settings.text:
The acoustic performance of our 6 Person Meeting Pod is
exceptional, just like our smaller pods. It offers top-tier soundproofing to
ensure that confidential discussions and presentations remain private and
undisturbed. The larger size of this pod is designed to accommodate more team
members without compromising on acoustic quality, making it an ideal choice for
collaborative meetings on a larger scale.
